title: Home
subtitle: Hosted by
tagline: Build Technology That Actually Gets Deployed
subheadline: Join developers, designers, and problem-solvers for a three-day hackathon addressing a real challenge hosted by Civic Tech Moncton with support from our charitable partner United Way. Unlike typical hackathons where projects die after the weekend, the winning solution will be fully developed and deployed to serve community organizations across Southeast New Brunswick.

realWorldImpact.title: REAL-WORLD IMPACT
realWorldImpact.description: Service providers are overwhelmed trying to help everyone. This year, more than 10,000 neighbors will need food banks, while 500 people are experiencing chronic homelessness and 50 more become homeless every month. Your solution will have measurable impact on real lives.

codeGoesLive.title: YOUR CODE GOES LIVE
codeGoesLive.description: The winning team partners with Civic Tech Moncton to fully develop and deploy your solution. This isn't a competition that ends Sunday, it's the start of a real project serving real organizations.

prizesRecognition.title: PRIZES + RECOGNITION
prizesRecognition.description: Compete for cash prizes of [TBD] plus the pride of seeing your work make measurable community impact. Winners recognized in all ongoing communications about the deployed solution.
